Item.Item: HP Envy 110 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
HP Envy 110 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Reviewer: Melissa Riofrio and Jon L. Jacobi
Item.Review:
The HP Envy 110 e-All-in-One inkjet multifunction printer looks like a classy VCR, acts like a Transformer toy, and prints magnificent photos. It’s also fully equipped for cloud printing. Is all that enough to make you forget its costly inks? Aesthetically oriented home and small-office users who don’t print much might be willing to make the trade-off.
Virtually everything on the Envy 110 e-All-in-One is designed with looks in mind. It forgoes basic black for a dark-mocha casing with copper-coloured metal accents. Thanks to its extremely low profile--just 4 inches high--it can sit discreetly on a deep shelf. When needed, the motorised control panel tilts upward, and the arm that catches the paper swings outward; otherwise, they tuck neatly into the machine’s smooth chassis. Another ... classy touch is the hefty scanner lid, which slowly settles into place rather than slamming when you let it go. Everything on the printer feels rock-solid--an increasingly rare attribute when it comes to any printer, let alone a consumer model. The solid construction also makes the Envy 110 quieter than most printers.
HP makes setting up the £249 (as of October 18, 2011) Envy 110 e-All-in-One easy. We chose Wi-Fi; USB is also available. The very attractive HTML-based interface lets you access printer settings across the network using your browser. The software bundle includes Photo Creations and HP Scan, which are both capable and attractive applications.
See HP Photosmart 7510 e-All-in-One review See Brother MFC-J825DW review See Canon Pixma MG6250 review
The control panel is wide and flat, with contextually lit controls (they light up only when needed). The 3.45-inch LCD touchscreen offers a crisp picture and good response, though one might argue that HP tries to fit too much information on each screen.
The Envy e-All-in-One prints, copies, and scans, but doesn't fax. USB/PictBridge, SD Card, and Memory Stick slots are included for printing directly from flash memory. With the focus on looks and a sleek profile, the Envy 110's paper handling is, not surprisingly, low-volume. Although automatic duplex printing is standard, the bottom-mounted input tray holds only 80 sheets, and the output arm holds just 25 sheets. The worst compromise is the nontelescoping lid on the letter/A4 scanner bed. The design doesn't put much of a margin between the glass platen and the edge of the cover, so it allows in more light than usual; it created shadows around our magazine scan. Such shadows are easily cropped, but in our tests they seemed to fool the scanner software's automatic-crop function.
HP was in the vanguard of cloud printing. Web-based printing apps have been available for select HP models for over a year, and the company's ePrint remote-printing feature launched in early 2011. The Envy 110 e-All-in-One offers all of that functionality, as well as support for Apple’s AirPrint.
In our tests the Envy 110 e-All-in-One printed very nicely. Images we printed on HP Advanced Photo Paper looked rich. Text was dark and sharp at both the default and best settings. We did notice some slight banding in images printed on plain paper (Hammermill Laserprint); this effect became more pronounced in draft mode, especially with monochrome graphics. Scans and copies were good overall.
The nice-looking output arrives somewhat slowly, however. Our text pages with scattered monochrome graphics printed at only 5.2 pages per minute on the PC and 5 ppm on the Mac--poky compared with the speeds of other inkjet MFPs we’ve tested. Printing a snapshot-size photo at default settings on plain paper took 22 seconds, or about 2.7 ppm; but it slowed to 56 seconds, or a little better than 1 ppm, when we switched to HP Advanced Photo Paper and better settings. On the Mac, a full-page, high-resolution colour photo took a slower-than-average 3 minutes and change to print.
The Envy 110 e-All-in-One's major unattractive feature is its ink costs. Although anyone who buys an MFP for looks and wow-factor probably won't care, the costs for this model are exorbitant... expand » « collapse

Item.Item: HP Envy 110 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review: Everything about this printer, from on-line purchase to final installation and use; went smoothly. I followed the instructions and setup was a breeze; including the wireless network setup. When I was given the option to print one of my own pictures, during setup, I was completely amazed at the quality of the print. It was true to life. I haven't used all the features, such as e-print and e-fax yet; but the printer does a great job of printing documents and copies. I was actually entertained, by the first two sided copy I made. No reloading of paper, after one side is printed; with this machine. It automaticly takes the paper back into the printer and prints the second side. Finally, this machine is just plain good looking. That didn't influence my purchase; but why not have a sleek, small ... footprint, if it's available? Need a printer? Buy it! expand » « collapse

Item.Item: HP Envy 110 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review: Ordering on-line and delivery were excellent. The printer was well protected from damage during delivery by its packaging. One parts problem was omission of a USB cable from the package. The USB connection is beautifully integrated into the case design, but was hard to find. Once I found it, setup was a snap using the USB cord from my previous printer. I need more types of photo output media to properly rate picture quality. Somewhat disappointed with plain paper results.

Item.Item: HP Envy 110 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review: I ve owned many printers through the years and this is the funnest, most innovative of them all. It was easy to set up and has worked seamlessly with my wireless network, Windows PCs, my MacBook Air, my iPhone, and my iPad. The main innovation is that this printer is natively network-connected (assumes you have a wireless router) which allows it to work wirelessly with all your computers and mobile devices (e.g. I took a picture of my grandson with my iPhone and printed it right from the phone while sitting on my couch holding the boy). It also means that the printer has an email address. That means you can let others send print jobs to the printer through their email (e.g. when my daughter is doing homework at a friend s house she can email her paper to the printer and the printed report ... is waiting for her when she gets home, also my out-of-town children can give me surprise prints of pictures of the grandchildren just by emailing them to the printer). The direct network connectivity also means that the printer itself has onboard applications that let you pull content from the internet directly (no computer needed). Examples of that are that I gave my zip-code to the coupon app and I can download and print local money-saving coupons. I have printed free coloring book pages for the grandkids, and free greeting cards using other apps. The photos I print on photo paper are vibrant and beautiful. Finally, my wife appreciates how compact and sleek it looks sitting in the kitchen. It is powerful but has a small unobtrusive footprint. If you have a wireless network you will love this printer. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: HP Envy 110 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States

The adventure of this printer starts with the very nice packaging. The shipping box, the first sight documents and packaging are superior. The printer comes in its own carrying bag. Everything was layed out very nicely.
Initial instructions could not be more simple and easy to follow. Total setup time from out of the box to first print via Cloud was 10-15 minutes. The printer worked flawlessly. Copies are vibrant and laser in appearance.
There are 5 things and many more that make this printer worth every dollar.
1) You can print from your Android cell phone or tablet remotely, anywhere. Download ePrint app from the Android Market. It just worked without any problems. 2) The first thing I noticed when removing it from the shipping box was the appearance of high quali ... ty. This looks like a very expensive printer $$$. 3) Size: It is perfect for small areas and looks like high end theater equipment. 4) Cost: Just there is no way you can imagine something nicer in value for the price. 5) Print quality and features... Well,,, That's what you are buying it for .
Cons: I read over and over.... Don't accept the online update.... Just say NO!!! expand » « collapse

Item.Item: HP Envy 110 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.ReviewTitle: Very well thought-out, works like a champ.
Item.Review:
I love this printer. You can print wirelessly from your iPhone, iPad, and your PC or Mac. You can receive hardcopy pictures and post cards from your friends and family members the world over by giving them your HPePrint e-mail address. The printer even looks great--I keep it near my TV, and it looks more like a DVR than a printer.
A little advice: Use HP paper or other decent paper, since the ink looks better with the HP inkjet paper (versus the bulk Xerox laser jet paper that I used first). Inkjet photo paper provides outstanding quality, but even the less costly all-purpose HP inkjet paper is very good.
Also, I would call HP Tech Support when you hook it up, regardless of how tech-savvy you are. They will make sure you are up and running, and they will also explain/demonstr ... ate some neat features that you might not otherwise discover. They can also get you squared away with an HPePrint account, and if you have an iPhone and/or an iPad, they can tell you which app to download and how to get that working (so you can print anything from your iPhone/iPad). If desired, you can also ask them to help you set up your 20-page-per-month free e-Fax account. I doubt you'll figure that one out on your own....
Also, I bought the USB cable just so I'd have it, but I don't plan on using it unless I need to print when no wifi is available. The printer itself is reasonably portable (about the size of a Blue-Ray/DVR but heavier), so if you ever need to take a printer to a show or a convention or something like that, I guess you could take this printer fairly easily. It's not super fast, but it's fine as long as you aren't the one who's always waiting for your stuff to come out while on your way to a meeting that starts in 15 seconds. So print speed is just so-so, but everything else absolutely rocks. It even prints duplex.
Ink seems to be readily available and affordable, and the printer has a lot of other features in its menu that many other printers don't (kid- and craft-relate ... expand » « collapse

Item.Item: HP Envy 110 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.ReviewTitle: G*R*E*A*T All In One Affordabile Ink Jet Printer
Item.Review: For less than $200.00 USD, this has to be the best ink jet all in one PLUS printer. The footprint is a little large, but one needs to remember that it is the same size as a full size flatbed scanner. The quality of the print is as good or better than many that cost more. The scanner is as good as any regular flat bed scanner ... no beef here! All of this, Print and Scan, using Bluetooth! Wowzers! Since I already use eFax, this part of the ENVY isn t utilized. The internet connectivity is THE BEST! We were in Columbus OH (we live near Buffalo NY) and wanted to print a document from my BlackBerry. So, followed the instructions, sent it off from Columbus and it was waiting for us when back home. Want more? There are widgets that allow you to print from Coupons.com and much more whether adult ... or young person. Have found everything to be as good, though much better than expected, as anyone could want. Wowzers HP! You ve done it again. I own 4 current HP printers, mostly laser, and would own nothing less. G*R*E*A*T Printer Under The Stars!!! expand » « collapse

Item.Item: HP Envy 110 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review: I've never written a review on a printer but I felt the need to on the HP ENVY 110. I have always owned HP printers (probably about eight in total) and they all were work horses (home use, not business). They never wore out so I either gave them to friends or donated to schools because I wanted a printer with newer features. In my opinion, printers are not that good looking sitting on my desktop but I take exception to the ENVY 110. This is, by far, the best looking piece of equipment I've owned and the quality I think is superior. I like the sleek look, the color and how unobtrusive it is and most people seeing for the first time would not know it was a printer. I think HP outdid itself on the design of the ENVY. As to the initial setup, it was a breeze. I'm not quite sure why some review ... ers felt the opposite. Installing the cartridges was easy; loading paper, easy; connecting to wireless, no problem; printing was fast and simple; quiet, yes; and fun to use, absolutely! eFax is free and easy to use and scanning worked great. I know nothing is perfect and the one negative I have so far about this printer is the paper tray. It comes out all the way (which I know is great for loading paper) but it is also easy for it to fall to the ground so I wish it at least had a catch to it to prevent it from coming all the way out. Otherwise, I couldn't be more happy with this printer and I'm so glad I chose to buy it. I researched other HP printers for quite some time before deciding to buy the ENVY. Am I ever glad I did! I highly recommend this printer. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: HP Envy 110 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review: The Envy 110 is a beautiful design, finished in a rich brown color with gold accents instead of black, beige, or gray. When turned off, it seals itself up in a smooth and clean exterior. The standard duplex printing and ability to connect to my iPad via AirPrint are important. But, there are weaknesses in the design. The print speed is remarkably slow when compared to the competition. The paper tray only holds 50 (or less, depending on paper weight) sheets of paper. And, with all of the motorized features (front door, paper catch "tray") it is a heavy piece of equipment. Even though it comes with a nice carry bag, it is definitely not a portable printer. I hope the elegant touches on the Envy will show up on future HP printers that will also have major improvements in speed and capac ... ity. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: HP Envy 110 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review:
After months of online reviews and features research, as well as buying and returning another brand, I bought this Dec. 2011.
I have never been so pleased with a printer. We use a Sprint hotspot and was concerned that a network was required. No need, this printer setup was spot on! I set up four laptops and two smart phones to print within half an hour.
I was told by customer service that I would need to be w/in 9' of printer to scan or print wirelessly. Not so - I can be three rooms away and it will be processing before I can walk to the printer.
Eprint works great-just make sure that you manage through your online eprint portal, those you want to print. I initially set for certain emails, but some didn't come through. I then removed filters to allow anyone as I knew ... whoever wanted to print would require my printer address and there was a small chance it would be misused. Now it works flawlessly.
Photos: my 18 year old is an artist. She loves the quality even when printed from her EVO phone.
I am having some difficulty with efax, but am told that it could be due to the fact that we don't have a static IP address with the hotspot. Customer service worked with me to set a static address, but since efax is doing updates, I will need to attempt after completion.
The touch pad is a little sensitive (as stated in other reviews), but you get used to it - watch the force of your first touch and you'll be fine.
All-in-all, this is so simple to use that my 11 year old utilizes it like a pro! I would even recommend this to my 73 year old mother. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: HP Envy 110 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States

Over the years, I've had a number of printers. Most of them HP. All were much, much better than the HP ENVY 110! which has NO external controls. It's usable only through the computer - and very little "control" over what comes out: size et cetera. The scans are all done in much reduced type size. Although it is only a few weeks old, I am planning to "throw it out" and buy something else as soon as I can "find the time.
DON'T BUY THE HP ENVY 110 ALL-IN-ONE PRINTER!

Item.Item: HP Envy 110 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.ReviewTitle: Pretty - but not quite a star
Item.Review: The HP ENVY 110 e is an attractive piece of equipment. Setup to print wirelessly from my iPad2 was a breeze once I ignored the HP software set up and followed directions off the internet. LOOKS & FUNCTION For all its modern (Apple-like) appearance the unit is kind of cheezy and clunky. The materials have an inferior plastic feel (very unApple-like). The touch pad is not quick to recognize your touch (usually you have to touch twice to enter data) and the constant automated moving and retracting of the control panel is almost humorous. I just wanted to print out a hard copy of a recipe off the internet from my iPad and was amazed at how long it took to print. CUSTOMER LOYALTY I am a long time user of HP products. I still use my HP Laser Jet 4M Plus - it is a stallion of a B& ... amp;W printer and has been functioning well for 20 plus years. I'm sure all those old design engineers are long gone from HP - but the young pups could sure learn a thing or two from them. Form = function. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: HP Envy 110 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review: This is by far the best home printer I have ever purchased. It was easy to setup right out of the box. Setup instructions should be a mute point for most people setting this machine up. After plugging it in and turning it on, the stylish and flexible display screen on the front takes over. Just follow the instructions it supplies for a fast and easy setup! There was one small problem which is why I gave this machine only 4 stars for perfomance. The key pad on the display screen seemed like several of the numbers/letters were slightly out of line which made it difficult to key in certain numbers & letters. After getting familiar with the quirks in the keypad though, everything else was flawless.The features available on this printer are second to none. It offers everything and then some ... that larger printers offer, including eprint, air print, copying and even faxing without the need for a phone line. And, like everything else about this printer, it's all easy to setup! Lastly, it's an attractive piece of equipment that fits just about anywhere you want to put it and since it's wireless (also quiet easy to setup) you can put it just about anywhere that it will fit, which is also just about anywhere! It looks like a nice piece of stereo equipment! Great job on this keeper, HP! Now I know why you gave it a name with "Envy" in the title. Everyone should want one! expand » « collapse

Item.Item: HP Envy 110 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review:
We recently purchased a maxed out HPE h8xt for both personal and business use and of course the old HP printer wasn't up to the task. We read all of the reviews and settled on the ENVY 110.
Incredible. I should just end this review here, incredible sums it up so nicely. I won't though. We don't write reviews but this machine deserves one.
Setup was incredibly easy, answer a few questions on the pop up control panel and we were up and running. Followed all the instructions to get online and was there within a few minutes. It's operation is extremely quiet compared to most printers and all it does is sit there looking all sleek like until its asked to do something, from anywhere.....and I mean anywhere. Backyard, frontyard, garage, upstairs and downstairs, like I said, anywhere ... . The HPePrint app works perfectly, all you have to do is write an email to your specific ePrint email address with the attachment you want to print and boom, seconds later it's there.
It's footprint is incredibly small for such a full featured printer, it can go just about anywhere. All of its operations are automatic including the little paper thing that swings out when printing, then swings back in when finished. It's an awesome inclusion into anyone's home office setup. There's no need for any wires except of course the power cord, no need for high speed usb wires....just plug it in, set your wireless up and there you are.
10+++++ from this small business which despises spending money on stuff we don't need and stuff that breaks within a day or so. We've had this printer working straight for the last couple of weeks and it hasn't missed a beat, but it is an HP, so that was expected.
Don't hesitate, this printer is worth every hard earned penny. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: HP Envy 110 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States

Item.Review: I love the ENVY 110. It's sleek, quiet, and the photo quality is good enough for a freelancer like me. I love everything about it except that the vaunted e-printing feature doesn't work. Apparently, even when I bought the printer recently, it was known the e-printing feature didn't work and would never truly be implemented. The website for it doesn't allow login/registration and I have never received an answer about it from HP. Aside from that, I could not be happier with the scan to computer, scan to FB, good printing volume, quality, wireless connectivity, and other features.

Item.Review: This printer works flawlessly, set up was a breeze, and I'm quite pleased. Air print from my iPhone works amazing and the email print works great as well. The only downside to this laptop would have to be its print speed. My Epson prints much faster then this printer. However, the looks of this printer are what sold me. It looks amazing! And it's very solid feeling compared to all other printers on the market. The glass top really adds to the design.

Item.Item: HP Envy 110 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review: I needed a new All-in-One printer as my existing HP did not work with Windows 7x64 nor did it have AirPrint. Since we have an IPad, two IPhone 4's a Macbook Pro and a Windows Laptop it was time for a new one which would work with all these devices. A HP printer was the only one which would meet our needs. After reading the reviews on all the HP multifunction printers, the ENVY 110 appeared to be the best choice. It turns out that the ENVY lives up to its excellent reviews. This printer is very simple to set up on a wireless network. Including unpacking, the printer it took no more than 30-40 minutes to have it up and running wirelessly on all 5 devices and it's been flawless since day one. In fact the printer set the entire system up itself with one button on its touch pad screen. I first ... downloaded the latest drivers for Windows 7 and Lion OSX then went into the printer menu on the ENVY Touch Screen and asked it to connect wirelessly and in seconds the printer was connected to all 5 devices, a Toshiba Laptop, a MacBook Pro, IPad, and 2 IPhones! By far the easiest wireless printer setup I've ever had and the most stable. It prints from any of the devices anywhere in the house. It's much more attractive than any previous printer I've had and prints flawlessly on 2 sides of the paper. Although I've not used the fax function yet, the eFax feature is perfect for our fax needs. Twenty free faxes a month is more than enough for us. I recommend this printer to anyone needing a multifunction printer for home use and doesn't require an automatic document feeder or large volume fax capabilities. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: HP Envy 110 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review: I bought this new model printer because my old printer would not work on my iMac. The software that came with it was outdated for the iMac, but I easily downloaded new software from the HP site. I've printed about 30 pictures , right out of the box . They were perfect photo quality. I researched many, many other printers and decided on this one because of all the great reviews. It definitely does what it says, and the colors are fantastic !

Item.Review:

This is a great printer for the value. Easy for family to use, great for iPhone printing.

Item.Item: HP Envy 110 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review: Everything about this computer is great- when it works! Nice sleek design, quiet, plenty of features, looks great, decent price, but after about 3 weeks would not work wit wi-fi reliably. Seems like the printer lost communication with the computer intermittently. Got it to work again, but when the computer/printer was turned off at the end of the day, the next day the computer AGAIN couldn't find the printer. Wasn't an issue with the wi-fi, as the indicator light on the printer was working, and the printer was only about 3 feet from the router. Seems like there is some software glitch with this printer, where it loses communication intermittently with the computer- which is EXTREMELY frustrating, because a key point of a printer is to print when you need it. If they can fix this g ... litch, I'd highly recommend. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: HP Envy 110 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review: The "Envy" is an excellent printer with easily installed black and color ink cartridges. The product was easily set up and worked like a charm. The connection between my I Pad through WiFi was a snap and works well. Only little problem is no tray for printing smaller images ( ex: 4x6 photos), but is easily worked around. All-in-all a great product for a good price.

Item.Item: HP Envy 110 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review: I had difficult time setting up the wireless and e- print software. Both install brochure with printer and online manuals inadequate. However once everything was setup the printer has run flawlessly in all respects. I have owned HP, Epson and Canon printers and always come back to HP. I have found them to be the most reliable of them all. The new Envy 110 replaces an HP Photosmart printer that I have used without a problem for over 8 years until the paper sensor recently failed.

Item.Item: HP Envy 110 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review: Very easy to setup and use. Works flawlessly when you download the correct software. The disk that came with the printer had a newer version online that worked much better. Always check for newer versions.

Item.Item: HP Envy 110 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.ReviewTitle: Love my Envy 110 e All In One
Item.Review: I love the compact size of this printer, the quality of the printing and the efficiency. It is so convenient to print from my iPad, iPhone, or laptop no matter where I am in my home. It was a great deal and worth every penny. I did my research before I purchased this particular printer and I am not sorry that I selected this one.

Item.Item: HP Envy 110 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review: I bought the Envy110 as an afterthought to my Envy 14 laptop. Little did I know that I would be just as impressed with the printer as I am with the computer! The elegant brown and gold color and sleek design looks more like high-end audio equipment than a printer. Not only does it match my laptop, but it looks so good that I put it in my bedroom! It's super quiet & fast, and the wireless is a must have as I can print from all of my devices, and the print quality is fantastic. With the instant rebate and coupon code, I checked out around $150+ tax! HP hit it out of the park with this one!

Item.Item: HP Envy 110 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review: Wow, what a terrible disappointment. Probably the most frustrating piece of electronics I've had to deal with in years. Printer is beautiful to look at, but the touchpad barely works! Typing in a password takes upward of 5-7 minutes. Push a key once, you get two letters. Push backspace and it will delete 3 characters. Very frustrating and unbelievable (but true). Also, it's a complete ink hog. Had to replace ink 3 weeks after I bought it. Did some color photo printing (about 10 8.5x11), but not much else. On top of that, I kept receiving messages from the printer that said it had detected counterfeit ink?! And this was the ink that came with it! To make matters worse, print jobs end up scattered all over the floor, print quality is irregular and often have streaks going through printouts. ... I can keep going.... Paper drawer is very hard to load with touchscreen open. Drawer doesn't hold very many sheets. Packaging looked like a cheap knockoff of Apple, but not nearly as elegant. Instruction sheet was so big, it fits in no file or file cabinet. On the plus side, HP throws in a free tote bag. My first HP product, def my last. expand » « collapse

Got this printer today for my macbook pro it took me less than 10 minutes to install wirelessly and sprint from my iPod. i don't understand why people would write negative comments about this product. great sleek design.

Item.Item: HP Envy 110 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review: This printer was relatively easy to install with my iMac, although the directions for it were not the best. The printer itself has exceeded my expectations. It is considerably faster than my last printer and the quality is very good.

Item.ReviewTitle: Scan function does nt work To Computer.
Item.Review: The scan function does not function as described. You cannot scan from Envy Printer Home Screen directly to Apple IMAC.. When you select Scan, you get the Scan screen that has 3 choices- scan to computer, scan to memory card and scan to USB. The scan to computer does not function. I have to control from my Apple IMac, not Envy Printer home screen. I was on phone with tech support for 2 hours without success in resolution.

Item.Item: HP Envy 110 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review: This is the perfect printer for me. It installed without a hitch. I linked 3 computers to it. Not a single problem. No sitting hassles like a lot of wifi products. The IPAD and IPOD picked it up without having to do a thing, just hit print and there it was. It is great not to need a specific computer on to print something. The print quality is better then any printer I have owned. Scans are very good also When it is idle it just sits on a shelf all closed up and looks like a nice piece of AV equipment. When you send it a print job it comes to life. The front panel rises up and the paper catcher swings out, like a little robot. When you take the printed paper out it closes up and goes back to sleep. I am very glad I spent the extra money for this printer over the less e ... xpensive more conventional big printers. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: HP Envy 110 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.ReviewTitle: Was just what I was looking for
Item.Review: I purchased and returned 3 printers before buying the Envy110. It performs flawlessly. I was looking for an air printer and this one fills the bill. Installation was very easy. We have two IPads and two IPhones and this printer prints great off all. The EFax was easy to install and works great.I needed a printer for my home office and I can't say enough on how impressed I am with the Envy110. The only drawback I see is you cannot fax multi pages. It is one at a time.

Item.Item: HP Envy 110 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States

Item.Item: HP Envy 110 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review: EASY TO USE, SIMPLY FOLLOW THE SET UP INSTRUCTIONS. VERY ATTRACTIVE OUTER CASING. IT'S LIKE HAVING ANOTHER PHONE/COMPUTER WITH AN ALL IN ONE PRINTER EMBEDED INTO IT. SO TRUE IF YOU CAN EMAIL IT YOU CAN PRINT IT. ALL YOU WILL NEED FOR EPRINT AN EMAIL ADDRESS FROM HP. THE SYSTEM PROMTS YOU TO CHOOSE AN ADDRESS @HPEPRINT.COM. THAT IS THE ONLY WAY YOUR SMART PHONE WILL SEND DOCUMENTS FROM THE PHONE TO THE PRINTER. I LOVE EPRINT IT REALLY WORK! IF YOU HAVE THE EPRINT APP ON YOUR PHONE BUT NOT AN HP EMAIL ADDRESS THEN YOUR EPRINT WILL HAVE TO GO TO A HP PARTICIPATING STORE OF YOUR CHOICE AS WILL BE LISTED ON YOUR SMART PHONE. WOW! THE PRINTER HAS APPS JUST LIKE A PHONE, SO SIMPLY PRINT AS YOU CHOOSE NO NEED TO SCAN TO PRINTER WOW! I HAVE ALWAY USED HP PRINTERS THIS IS SO HIGH TECH

Item.Item: HP Envy 110 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.ReviewTitle: First All-In-One printer and I LOVE it!
Item.Review:
After years of struggling with clunky, slow, basic printers, this one is a modern dream! I've never been so excited about a printer before! Despite some minor design flaws, I am very happy with this product and use it daily.
Pros: - Sleek, stylish, and ultra-modern design - Compact yet highly functional (scan, copy, print, fax) - Easy to install and use HP software - Scanned images are crisp and detailed
Cons: - Poor selection of apps and content within them (e.g., greeting card designs) - Noisy when starting up - Lack of paper-catch (e.g., when printing more than a few pages, the paper will fall onto the floor in a disorganized mess) - Delayed response to touch-screen - Lack of scroll bar for "swiping" motion on touch-screen (e.g., have to swipe ov ... er the icons, which oftentimes accidentally selects an app that you didn't intend to use) expand » « collapse

Item.Item: HP Envy 110 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review:
Installation of The HP Envy 110 All-in-One Printer was painlessly completed and ready for use in minutes. I use this printer on my home network which consists of; a Macbook Pro, an iPhone 4, three iPhone 4Ss, an iPod Touch, a Windows laptop and a Wndows desktop. I have printed from each of these devices and from the printer itsself, with absolutely no problems at all.
All of my apple devices automatically found the printer; my windows devices required adding the printer manually, which I completed with ease.
All functions have worked seamlessly.
The touchpad is a bit difficult to navigate and could use a makeover and the printer is not whisper quiet as advertised. It seems to me that the noise produced is on average with most printers.
I am completely satisfied ... with my purchase and would definitely recommend this printer. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: HP Envy 110 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review: I love the Envy 110 e-all-in one! I wanted an all-in-one unit that would be inconspicuous in my living room. It looks like a CD unit (sleek) when in fact you can copy, print, scan, fax, etc. from this little jewel. The tray for holding printed documents remains hidden until you press print or copy for a document. This tray will swing out to capture the documents as printing. Once you remove the printed document, the arms swings back into the machine (out of sight). Highly recommend.

Item.Review: We purchased the Envy 110 as we wanted a wireless printer. After many days of reviewing different HP printers, which is what we have always owned, we decided to purchase this one. Many of the reviews referred to the use of a lot of ink but so far, we dont seem to think that this is an issue as we dont do any major printing of large documents. This is an amazing product for everyday use. Works very nicely with the IPAD with no extra steps needed to set up. We are VERY pleased with this purchase from HP. We would recommend this product to anyone!

Item.Item: HP Envy 110 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review: This is a very nice printer and so easy to use. However, if I had known it would not print my labels I use for my bath and body products (gloss) I would not have bought it and would have spent my money on something better for all labels. When I print on my lotion labels (gloss), they still want to smear when i put the labels on my bottles, even after the labels have been drying for hours. If you need a printer just for faxing and printing on regular paper or possibly a matt type paper, this printer is great. Just frustrated that now I can't get another printer just yet and have wasted good money on labels that were ruined.

Item.Item: HP Envy 110 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review: I Have only had this product for a few days and therefor am still working on learning it's true capabilities and limitations. the two sided print is nice and saves on your paper costs. It is however necessary to set this in the printers preferences tab. And don't be misled into the confusion of having to buy a duplexer this model doesn't require one.The print is assigned it's own email address allowing you to "email" you documents to your printers query and print them from afar. Operation is smooth and quiet and a neat little feature is the printer's door opens and a paper rest rotates outward to collect your copies. The printer's touch screen has apps specifically oriented to popular web sites or you can create your own!! One minor disappointment is no seperate tray for photo paper so you ... have to remove one size for another. All in all it's a sophisticated printer that I would recommendfor anyone from novice to pro! expand » « collapse

Item.Item: HP Envy 110 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review: There is no question that this is one of the best looking printers on the market but it is also one of the easiest printers to set up and use that I have ever had. I have a Mac and the setup was seamless. I use android phone/tablets and that was also simple and quick to set up. The quality of photo's is more than acceptable and the regular duplex printing is of a very high standard. One tiny thing to remember is to make sure you have 'eprint' set to ON under the Web Services tab. I believe ON is the default setting but whilst playing I accidentally unchecked it.

Item.Review: This printer is amazing!!!!! Love it, it's sleek and sexy!! Printing from anywhere is as easy as a push of a button. Fully compatible with my IPhone! Great overall!!!

Item.Item: HP Envy 110 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.ReviewTitle: HP ENVY 110e is a Class Act
Item.Review: This printer is a class act. It is downright magical. From the packaging to the performance HP has done an outstanding job on this printer. It installed automatically, it performs great and I am very pleased with it and do not hessitate to recommend it to others.

Item.Item: HP Envy 110 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.ReviewTitle: Excellent Easy to Use Compact Quality Printer
Item.Review: Excellent printer. Easy to set up, easy to use and excellent print quality. Keep it in another room and can print anywhere in my house - super convenient! Highly recommend. You will be very, very happy with everything about this printer, including its looks!

Item.Item: HP Envy 110 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review:
Pros: Quiet; Easy To Set Up; Reliable; Easy To Use; Fast Operation; Great Print Quality; Compact Design
Streamline , looks nice and modern, not like the heavy bulky ones that are typical. Very pleased, works great , a good value for the price. Shipping was phenominal! Bought it online Cyber Monday and got it the next day! Boy was I ever surprised!

Item.Item: HP Envy 110 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review: After installing the new Mac operating system, my old Canon copier bit the dust despite repeated efforts to upgrade and reinstall it. After researching copiers, I decided on the ENVY and have loved it so far. Directions are right inside the box for installation with the new Mac system! In less than than half an hour it was up and running with all our computers and other devices hooked in, eprinting as well. I love the small size, not much bigger than a DVD player. It is quiet and copies and photos have been without complaint. Only one small drawback is that the paper holder is smaller than on other printers so paper runs out more frequently.

Item.Item: HP Envy 110 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review: I needed a printer that was compatible with OS Lion so I did a little research and liked what I read about the Envy 110-e. It was very easy to set up and it works beautifully. The print quality is excellent, and the features are easy to use. Very glad I made this purchase. The only thing I don't like is that there is no ADF for scanning multiple documents at once.

Item.Review:

Item.Item: HP Envy 110 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review: This printer has all the whistles and bells for wireless work. What was really a big problem is that you cannot print large documents....say anything over 2 pages. The paper that comes out of the printer onto receiver curls in the middle so the next sheet that prints out bumps the first sheet and so on and so on. A BIG annoyance. I have to sit with all my print jobs now otherwise the pages will surely be on the floor and scattered.

Item.Item: HP Envy 110 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review: I really like this new printer, it's a lot of fun to use. The features are amazing, we haven't used all of them yet,but what we have looks really good, the print is plain and very clear. I still have yet to print pictures, but if they look as good and just the plain printed work, I would recommend this Envy printer to everyone. We are very pleased which our printer.

Item.Item: HP Envy 110 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review: By far and away the best printer I've ever owned. I bought the new Envy because my previous printer would not print from my iPad. Shipment and delivery were speedy. Set up was really simple. The compact look is stylish. And the device works perfectly. Prints from iPad. Copies. Scans. All with ease. And my friends can't believe how compact it is. An amazing new product.

Item.Item: HP Envy 110 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review: very quick and easy installation. no problems at all. works with our pc, laptop and ipad seamlessly. done in less than an hour. quiet printer. silent compared to our old one. very happy with our choice. should have done it years ago.

Item.Item: HP Envy 110 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review: Once in a while it makes "funny" noises, but seems to be alright. Mechanical action seems to slow everything down, but this is just a gut feel sort of thing. It's kind of hard to tell if it is on or off (icons are barely visible and the little bitty blue light is almost invisible. I am personally concerned that all the mechanical activity will result in an early failure, but this is a concern and not a criticism.

Item.Item: HP Envy 110 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review: I am a big supporter of HP printers and have been for a very long time. When I had a chance to purchase this printer at a nice discount, I jumped at the chance to ditch my 1 yr old very lightly used HP 6500 Wireless printer. The ENVY is MILES better! It was a cinch to attach to my wireless network, walks you through the setup process and incredibly QUIET! I also appreciate the footprint! Nice work HP! Keep it up and I will continue to support you!

Item.Item: HP Envy 110 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review:
Being the first wireless printer I have ever owned, I was extremely excited to setup this machine and test it out. Setup was a breeze and for the most part self-explanatory. Whether printing from a computer, smart phone, or another device, it started printing immediately, and the quality of the prints is absolutely fantastic. The option to print directly from the printer itself is also very convenient.
I'm also very happy with all the "green" features of this printer. Double-sided printing is something that should definitely be standard for all printers.
This piece is very compact (yet surprisingly heavy!) and will certainly compliment any space in a home or office. Everyone who sees this immediately asks about it, and they're completely shocked when I tell them that it is a ... printer. Then they are amazed even further when I show them the way the tray pops out automatically while printing.
There are only a few cons I have discovered so far. Most importantly, the touch screen needs A LOT of work (it helps if you use two fingers when scrolling through options and one finger for making selections). So don't go buying this printer thinking you're going to download some crazy apps and replace your iPod or anything. Also, this is not a huge deal, but I noticed that when I connect the power cord to the printer, there was a lot of wiggle at the connecting point. It is still a secure connection and requires a reasonable amount of effort to actually disconnect the cord from the printer, but it is something that I would prefer to be slightly more stable.
A few more things to also consider before buying: - Some reviews I have read online have mentioned problems with the printer occasionally dropping its connection with their wireless network. I have not run into this, but this is something that you must expect to happen once in a while with just about any wireless device. - The ink (HP60) is a little pricey, so make sure you can afford to refill your cartridges before you bu ... expand » « collapse

Cons: Haven't Found Any Cons

Item.Item: HP Envy 110 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review: Only one feature was missing: no place to hook up the phone line for fax use. My disappointment was brief. The efax is FREE for the first 20 pages per month!!! Our iPads easily print to this printer. Easier set up than our previous printers

Item.Item: HP Envy 110 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review: This has been the easiest printer set up I've ever experienced! A monkey could do it!! No kidding!! It works like a charm, no problem printing from my desktop computer or any mobile devices, such as, phone, laptop. I really like the touch screen. With a touch, I can go to my facebook page and print a pic I like, or go to snapfish, or quickforms, etc., etc., etc/!! LOVE!

Item.Item: HP Envy 110 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.ReviewTitle: E All in one with extra fees
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Use; Reliable; Smooth; Quiet; Fast Print Time; Compact Design; Easy To Set Up
E all in one .... Not free to fax I replaced a reliable all in one with a fax to upgrade. My son brought this for me. I was disappointed to see that I could not fax like my other HP All in one this has e fax I only do a few faxes a year but to use E fax you must pay a monthly fee .... it says the first 20 pages or so are free but you still have to pay a fee each month if you use this printer just for printing and scanning your good to go but the E Fax is not a good feature for small fax uses. unless you want to spend money each month on a service that is not used often

Item.Item: HP Envy 110 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review: I've only been using this printer for about 1 week and so far I am very satisfied with it. The only draw back that I have noticed, and it isn't a big problem, is that if you want to print a photo you have to change the paper. It only has one paper tray. But since I don't print a lot of photos, it's not a big draw back. I love the connectivity it has with my iPhone, iPad and iPod Touch. The automatic two-sided printing is very nice, too. Saves on paper. It's also very quiet. At first, I didn't think it was even printing until the page came out. All-in-all, it's a very nice printer, well made, very responsive and even looks good.

Item.Item: HP Envy 110 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States

Item.Review:

The Staples employees had a negative attitude and would sell anything to anyone without fact finding and determining the customers needs. I ended up with three different printers before I got this one. I paid for an installation and had to return the printer. Staples refused to refund the $80 inst. charge and I had to install this printer myself which was not easy and required over an hour of my time on the phone with HP.

Would be nice if you could load both 4 X 6 photo paper and standard letter paper at the same but that's OK. Only negative I have is that the touch screen is not great. Guess I'm spoiled from the touch screen on my IPad.

I do, however miss the top loading of papers to copy as in the HP OfficeJet Wireless. Other than that, I havent figured out all the features yet, but LOVE the two sided copying.

Item.Item: HP Envy 110 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review: This is a great product and I am enjoying it so much. The touch screen face is a wonderful feature and the wireless capabilities are perfect for a home office setting.

Item.Item: HP Envy 110 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.ReviewTitle: Best Printer I have ever dealt with
Item.Review: I LOVE this printer! It's simply the next step in printer evolution! I bought it because I wanted the touch screen and the wireless function. Set up was a breeze and it practically did it itself, it was very instinctive to set up and use without too much thought. In the years of fixing everyone's computers and setting up their printers this has been the very best hands down in every way I can think of and It's very quite. When I first saw it I couldn't believe it's an All-in-One Printer, it's so much more sleek then the other All-in-Ones, it can print on both sides of the paper, something I've never had before except on the huge company copiers that cost thousands, and they break down constantly! I just can't say enough good things about it! There are very few negative feedbacks here, u ... nfortunately there is always going to be a few that get through quality control with some, problems, but someone thinking that the printer cartridges are hard to replace? That I just don't get, I mean how much easier do you want it? it just can't get much easier! My 9 year old has no problems using it and replacing paper and the ink cartriges! So adults who have problems I'm thinking it's not the product but the user! expand » « collapse

Item.Item: HP Envy 110 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States

It sits next to my DVD player and it looks like a VCR not to mention it prints, copies, scans, etc wonderfully. THE BEST LOVE IT!!!!!!!!!!!

Item.Item: HP Envy 110 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review:
Love the product except for its wireless feature. Consistently get the message that the printer is "offline" when I try to print from a computer in another room. There appears no way to get the printer connection back without going to my other computer, which is located directly next to the printer and to which the connection remains, and playing around with its print queue or printing a document, which seems to re-establish the connection to the remote computer.
Wasn't able to find anything on the HP website to help with this problem. Just a lot of comments by people withe the same issue.

Item.Item: HP Envy 110 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review: I've had this Envy 110 for three days now and deceided to hook it up today. However you can't do that with out the cable you " NEED " or HP wants to sell you for $19.00. With out that cable you can't hook up the wireless component that your computer needs to reconnize the wireless printer. I'm lucky that I already had one to use. It's only needed for about 30 seconds, unless your going to keep it as a hard wire connection and skip the e-FAX and e-PRINT feature. About that::::: I hooked it up both ways. After registering in to the e-Print / Fax site and got my personnel phone number. After reading the agreement ( witch never seemed to stop) Your totally confused about charges of this free site. Then they ask for your credit card number. I backed out because of the "double talk".... ... I'm keeping it hard wired for now. The 110 it-self is pretty nice. The door doesn't close all the way after the paper is ejected and the "swing arm" needs to be a little wider to keep the printed documents from falling to the floor. I like the system but, I don't think it will have long life span. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: HP Envy 110 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review: Setup was easy. I had to put in network acquisition information manually because of password protection but everything worked on the first try after inputing the instructions. The paper tray has essentially no clearance above the desktop. Because of a low barrier in front of the printer I had to elevate it with four rubber feet but the fix was easy and the resulting configuration is stable and convenient. Operation of the printer is quiet and the output is excellent. Scan uploads to the Internet and downloads from it have been flawless.

Item.Item: HP Envy 110 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.ReviewTitle: Nice when it works, which is rare. Don't buy it.
Item.Review: It is nice looking and, when it does it, it prints well. The problem is that most of the time it doesn't work and I spent hours in troubleshooting. First, it did not work wil Lion, although I bought it as a package with an Apple air computer. Hours to search and install a patch software. Since then, it works very sporadically. Often it appears tot to be on line, even if the troubleshooting and the printing indicates that it is. I have tried 3 different wireless environments and the problem remains. By trying often to renter all the wireless info, it works, albeit sporadically. I tried to update the software and it is now stuck in "do not power off during the update" for over a week. I have tried unsuccessfully to turn it off, to linke it to the computer by cable.

Item.Item: HP Envy 110 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review: Hi my name is Russ. I am in my freshman year at Baker College Online. I was fumbling through classes and assignments for the first eight months. I had purchased my used HP laptop from a friend for $250, he had bought himself a new HP laptop. When I got into college I had no idea what it was going to take (equipment wise) to make good grades. once I started, I found out real quick what I needed. I went to the HP store and found everything I need to make the grade, I don't understand how I got along without the HP store.

Item.Item: HP Envy 110 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review: I have never owned a printer of this quality !!! Not only is it GORGEOUS....it is amazing !! When it is not in use...it sits there looking all stylish & it would fit any setting without being ugly or intrusive !! I love the fact that I can print from my Ipad, ipod, & computer without any wires !!! It is a very intuitive printer, & I am very, very pleased with this purchase. This printer proves that you get what you pay for.....& it is worth every single penny !!!!!!

Item.Item: HP Envy 110 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review: I have always had HP printers, they are the best. But this Envy, WOW, it's fantastic. I waited until after the holidays to have more time, thinking it might be an involved process. It was not. Followed the boxed instructions and was up and printing in no time. Played with it, using my iPad, and someone else's iPad, neat! And then, we set up the eprint email and UNBELIEVABLE, AMAZING. What will HP think of next? I would recommend this eprinter 5 Stars+. Thanks HP for your wonderful printers.

Item.Item: HP Envy 110 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review: This is an excellent printer and according to my other half it fits in well in the den. Looks like a audio video componet sitting there on the shelf and not a large bulky printer. Responds well and excellent printing. Like they say if momma ain't happy then no ones happy and she thinks this fits well with her stuff. Seriously this is a great item and I love it.

Item.Item: HP Envy 110 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review: I am not sure what these other reviews are all about that say, it lost connection, I had to reset it, It didn't work too well, etc. All I have to do is power it on, and tell my i Phone, I Pad, or i Mac to print, and it automatically finds the printer, and prints the data. Only complaint I could see was the arm for holding printed pages. Generally it drops anything over two, or three pages on the floor. That being said, for what I use it for, and what I purchased it for, it works terrific.

Item.Item: HP Envy 110 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States

Item.Item: HP Envy 110 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States

Item.Item: HP Envy 110 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States

Item.Item: HP Envy 110 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States

Item.Review:

Love this printer! Only problem, would not start when I took it out of the box. Took it back to Staples store. They gave me another, no questions asked. It works perfectly. Easy set up. Very user friendly. I may buy a second one for the downstairs in my house.

Item.Item: HP Envy 110 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review: I purchased this produce mainly because of its ability to handle AirPrint. I have been unable to get this feature up and running but eprint is working fine. Also, scanning to computer is awkward, but scanning to other media is a valid substitution. Other than these two problems the printer works like all of my other HP printers..flawlessly.

Item.Item: HP Envy 110 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review: This is my third all-in-one printer from HP. It seems that I purchase a new printer every eight or so years. I have paid more for my previous HP printers and I like this one the best. The HP Envy 110e looks really nice, the set-up was very easy and the wireless printing is flawless. Thank you for a third time HP.

Item.Item: HP Envy 110 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review: I do love this printer. My new computer recognized it immediately and I was up and printing in literally minutes. The only reason I didn't give it five stars is it doesn't have blue tooth and I use Open Office and it doesn't recognize that as one of the extensions.

Item.Item: HP Envy 110 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review: I am happy with my purchase. I haven't used all the functions yet. I love that I can print wireless. I also can print from my IPAD2. It works great. Only had it for one week.

Item.Item: HP Envy 110 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review: I have been searching and longing a very long time for such a great input/output device as the ENVY 110 e-All-in-One. I finally have an excellent Sleek and compact master communication partner by my side.

Item.Item: HP Envy 110 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review: We love our Envy 110 all in one printer, it does everything well and looks great. I did not give it 5 stars across the board because it does not print as fast as my old Deskjet 6980 and I feel that a hard copy manual should have been included due to the large feature set. Overall I would recommend the Envy 110 to anyone who needs an all around solid printer, copier & scanner.

Item.Item: HP Envy 110 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.ReviewTitle: No more HP printers for me
Item.Review: It seems no HP printer will print card envelopes (birthday, holiday,,,, none.) I have heard people say they bought Canon printers because of this very reason. This Envy is very touchy. When you have to put letters or numbers in, either 2 come up instead of 1 or nothing happens. One of the first steps they tell you to do when setting up the printer is set the time. It did not have EDT that I could see, and I have gone through the manual several times and can find no reference to setting the time, so all faxes have the incorrect time on them. It also falls asleep fast ... so fast and so deep, I have no idea how to wake it up. Trying to print something doesn't do it. Needless to say I am very disappointed in my purchase.

Item.Item: HP Envy 110 e-All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.ReviewTitle: Truly is the best printer purchase ever
Item.Review: This printer is AMAZING. I've bought one specific brand for years and have had problems with them, never worked the way they should. The HP had worked exactly as it should . Remote printing is wonderful. I will be telling everone who needs a new printer " This is the one you need to get"
